DOC.brief_summary: An evaluation of the long term safety of tanezumab when administered by subcutaneous injection every 8 weeks for up to 64 weeks
DOC.brief_title: Safety Extension Study Of Tanezumab When Administered By Subcutaneous Injection To Patients With Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study was terminated on 29 September 2010 following a US FDA clinical hold for tanezumab osteoarthritis clinical studies which halted dosing and enrollment of patients on 23 June 2010 for potential safety issues.
DOC.criteria: Must have participated in specific Phase 3 parent study Failed screening for parent study, pregnant women, lactating mothers
